author: Shirley J. Brainard
title: Shirley J. Brainard
text: I had to return my purchase & couldn't exchange it. I called customer service to explain I'd PAID the postage, instead of them deducting it from my return amount. (my postage half the price of theirs.) The customer service man - Tong - handled it the way I chose.
